description: My place is close to Barclays Center, Atlantic Terminal, Prospect Park, all the subways, plus tons of great restaurants and bars! You’ll love this cozy home for the amazing location, outdoor space and a working fireplace! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Cozy One-Bedroom in Park Slope
review: This is a very cute apartment in a fantastic location that made me fall in love with Brooklyn. This is definitely a lived-in apartment so be aware that there are plenty of personal items in the house and that it's not a spare rental. There are two levels of stairs to climb up to, however, they are big and easy stairs and should not be a problem for most people. The  very cozy outdoor terrace was a really nice feature.
